title: April Contest Nominations
body:
Hey-pril! It's Maypril. That means you need to tell me which stories from April made you gape-ril. Click here to nominatepril. Something, something, Professor Snape-ril.

Here are some rules-pril:

  • Only stories posted in April 2018 are eligible.

  • Writers who have won in the past 12 months are not eligible.

  • Writers and readers may nominate and may nominate any number of stories they wish.

  • Only the first parts of series are eligible.

  • We get it, you vape-ril.
author: EtTuTortilla
